title: Somebody Up There Hates You - Hollis Seamon.epub
description:
Chemo, radiation, a zillion surgeries, watching my mom age twenty years in twenty months: if thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s part of the Big DudeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s plan, then itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s pretty obvious, isnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t it? Somebody Up There Hates You.

SUTHY has landed me here in this hospice, where weÃ¢â‚¬â€thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s me and SylvieÃ¢â‚¬â€are the only people under 30 in the whole place, sweartogod. But IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m not dead yet. I still need to keep things interesting. Sylvie, too. I mean, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re kids, hospice-hostages or not. We freak out visitors; I get my uncle to sneak me out for one insane Halloween night. Stuff like that. And Sylvie wants to make things even more interesting. That girlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s got big plans.

Only SylvieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s father is so nuclear-blasted by whatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happened to his little girl, he glows orange, I swear. ThatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s one scary man, and heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not real fond of me. So we got a major family feud going on, right here in hospice. DO NOT CROSS line running down the middle of the hall, me on one side, her on the other. ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s crazy.

In the middle of all of this, really, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just me and Sylvie, a guy and a girl. And we want to live, in our way, by our own rules, in whatever time weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve got. We will pack in some living before we go, trust me.
